page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{EMPLOYMENT
Apart from local self-employed craftsmen and tradesmen in the village who may employ assistants, and the services like the Doctor, banks, the school, etc., there is no real employment in the village. To seek employment people have to travel to surrounding towns and most working people commute to Kendal or Lancaster or even further afield. The nearest employers of large numbers are Libby, McNeil and Libby (food processors) and Henry Cook (paper manufacturers) at Milnthorpe.
There is very little unemployment among the resident population of Arnside.
